cpbc_no_consumption_data: No usage for the period selected.
cpbc_object_storage_consumption_info_par: You get billed based on the actual storage space, calculated every hour, rounded to the nearest hour.
cpbc_object_storage_output_traffic_info_: Every outgoing gigabyte is billed (whatever the destination)
. You have used {{amount}} GiB during this period.  Incoming traffic is never billed.
cpb_error_message: Oops, we can not retrieve all the information.
